website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, warm, inexpensive, and slender fitted wetsuit jacket that may feel a little snug at first, but after wearing it a few times, the EYCE will perfectly conform to your body for an cozy fit.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, from small to XXXL
cons: A naturally tight fit, but it was designed this way to minimize drag

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, inexpensive jacket. I purchased this item for jet-skiing in colder water, and am very pleased with how it fits, and how comfortable it is. "For the record I am Jennifer's husband', I'm 5'11",215# with longer arms and the XL fits good...I think I could probably fit into a Large, but a 2X would have been way too big. I was especially happy to see that the sleeves were long enough as I usually have to buy "tall" or the next size up to get sleeves long enough. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and  the second one did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Which means nothing to you unless you have my measurements. Chest 38 waist 36 weight 153 height 5'4. A large was way to big but the medium is perfect. One thing that needs to be improved is the way the zipper is installed at the bottom of the jacket. It is difficult to fit the two pieces together because the straight prong is way to small. When clothing manufactuers want to reduce costs one of the first things to go are decent zippers. Still I give the jacket a solid 4 stars on quality, and price and go one size short off the chart. I
customer_reviews.author: John Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Huge and unfortunately it doesn't fit myself or my partner, which we tried it out before realizing it is too big. Tbe quality for the price is amazing though and I plan on ordering agian in a smaller size and putting the one we have on craigslist since it has already been used. Certainly check this measurement on this one though since it runs closer to normal sizing them other wetsuits.
customer_reviews.author: Poly Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good value wetsuit jacket
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit jacket seems well-made at a great price point. We will be returning it because of sizing--the length is too short in the arms and body, but not snug enough over-all (my son is 6'3 and 165 so he is hard to fit, we bought a medium). I took off a star because there is a brand label marked on the jacket. The absence of a label was one of the main reasons I had selected this jacket and this was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Marmill mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and keeps me warm. It traps a layer of water between your body and the suit and after a small while your body heats the water which keeps you warm. Interesting that when I get out of the water and let the water drain from my arm onto my feet how really warm the water is. Very good buy for the money. I use this for swimming in the pool when the water gets to cold for just a bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: JRZ42

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the Small size was too large in the body (chest) for me. I'm about 5' 9" and 135 lbs. The arm diameter, sleeve length and overall body length were fine, but the chest area was too large (ie not tight enough) for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who is attending University of Hawaii for marine biology (I wish I had figured out that one at his age!). He was getting a little cold after long periods in the water while doing research and this jacket does a great job of warding off the cold. Additionally it functions as UV protection. He seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Grendel177

customer_reviews.title: FITS TIGHTLY, BUT PROBABLY SUPPOSED TO
customer_reviews.text: The wet suit top was easy to get on and off, unlike some of my friend's wet suits. The zipper is backward, with zip pull-tab on the left. I have never had a zipper pull on the left, I thought I had been sent a female garment in error, but not so, it is just weird. Also the zipper sports a really tiny starter tooth, my only two complaints. I have to teach my left hand to pull a zipper...gasp! The suit top dried quickly and was ready for he next day in 3 hours hanging in the hall, tho I turned it inside out after the outside was dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel is good
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pull over surf tops and was looking for an easier one to put on for cooler mornings surfcasting on the East coast. I am very happy with the look & feel of this top. I found the sizing chart to be very accurate. I have only used it a few times fishing so far so hard to tell about how it will hold up but from what I can see I think it will wear pretty well. So far I think it works as well as my much pricier tops so I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for scuba diving as an extra layer. Haven’t put it through it’s paces yet, but initially pretty impressed with the quality at this price point. Even if it doesn’t last that long, it’s cheap enough to be replaced every so often. If I get maybe 60-80 dives out of it I’d be totally satisfied. Plain but nice looking as well. I like that it’s basic black/grey and not covered in logos.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: What's Not to Like?
customer_reviews.text: Well made..flat seams and seamed cuffs are comfortable and don't chafe. Heavy duty zipper is easy to operate. I recommend wearing a base layer no matter what brand you buy as it makes removal when wet so much easier. I would buy this again with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Garyak

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cool / warm water swim, to maintain core temp. Comfortable & front zip makes it easy to get on & off. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Works but I would upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Works good for kayaking I prefer the full suit . Only pulse is you can take it off if you get hot kayaking
customer_reviews.author: Robert munoz

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and well made!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this jacket. I was a little worried because it was so inexpensive but very well made and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic wetsuit jacket at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this basic wetsuit jacket for indoor pool water walking during the chilly midwest winter. It works out just fine, much better than a thermal rash guard. All at a really reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the item. Great fit. Keeps me nice and warm even when I get wet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than my O’Niel top. This one doesn’t have any bad neoprene smell.
customer_reviews.author: Hopps

customer_reviews.title: Great fit , value
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large it’s perfect! I’m 5’10” 210 pounds 34 in waist 45 inch chest , this thing fits perfectly, I haven’t used it on my wave runner in cold water yet but the fit & feel are awesome, my wife wants me to order her one now.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sticklen

customer_reviews.title: Order the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than expected material I normally wear an xl shirt. Ordered a triple x. Fits well I am 6’3 260 sleeves are long enough and it is comfortable The zipper is on the left though
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Haag

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: XL fit my 6foot 215 lb frame very well. Am very pleased with the quality of this jacket and it's performance in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: d mace

customer_reviews.title: Valueeeee
customer_reviews.text: I do swim lessons 4 hours a day through the summer. This suit make it so that I’m comfortable and don’t have to sunscreen up 50 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Play water volleyball in FL. . Keeps me warm in the 50 's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ 3” 200lbs with long arms. XL fit perfect! Seems well made. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rowana H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Zipper is strong, material is great quality fit to specs is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: patrick bonomo

customer_reviews.title: slightly off on sizing but very well made
customer_reviews.text: seems to run about a size to small and sleeves are very short. otherwise is very well made and is a quality prodjuct
customer_reviews.author: DPNY88

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made and the perfect thickness. Nice and long through the torso and extends past waist at least four inches. The quality is better than the $99 one at Wetsuit Wearhouse my husband bought a few years ago. Husband is 6' tall and weighs 192# and the XL works for him. Neither of us can believe the quality for the price. The company logo on the left chest is smaller and more faint than in the picture, not really noticeable. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BeachRabbit

product_meta.title: EYCE Dive & SAIL Men's 3mm Wetsuit Jacket Top Long Sleeve Neoprene Wetsuits
product_meta.description: SIZE-----Small----Medium---Large----X-Large---2X-Large---3X-Large Chest---35"-37"---37"-39"---39"-41"---41"-43"---42"-44" ----45"-47" Waist---31"-33"---33"-35"---35"-37“----37“-39”---38“-40”-----39"-41" Length----25"---------26"---------27"--------27.5"--------28”----------29" 3mm ultra soft and super stretch neoprene keep you warm on DIVING, KAYAKING, CANOEING, PADDLE BOARDING, KITE BOARDING, WAKE BOARDING and other water sports
feature_bullets: Please carefully CHECK our SIZE CHART to get best fit wetsuit.

Made of premium insulating 3mm neoprene Our wetsuit jackets may feel TIGHT. It's because our wetsuit jackets are specially designed to be figure-fitting which reduces the drag in water and keeps the divers warm. It should fit snugly, tight to the body. Please carefully CHECK our SIZE CHART to get best fit wetsuit.

Our wetsuit jackets are made from neoprene- synthetic rubber. The wetsuit jacket might seem too tight when the customers are trying on at home or anywhere out of the water but will turn out to be just right when the wetsuit jacket is wet. Because when the wetsuit jacket is dry, it tend to stick in some places. When it fills with water the sticky spots slip a little.
Neoprene is a material that will stretch. After being worn several times, the wetsuit jacket should be stretched in all the right places and will be at its ideal fit.
Perfect to keep your body warm in the coldest conditions for DIVING, KAYAKING, CANOEING, PADDLE BOARDING, KITE BOARDING, WAKE BOARDING and other water sports
